title: Ghost Game anyone? How can i fix it?
body:
Hi guys i am already stuck two 2,5 hours in ghost game (just reconnect buttom) i dont know what to do......
I already tried to fix it from videos on youtube or by advices from old discussions what i found here

replies.body: I'm not sure how you could be stuck in two games at once, but if you *do* see a reconnect button then this is most likely not a ghost game. If that reconnect button isn't working, you'll need to troubleshoot your connection with the steps in this [**guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), the ones on port forwarding and dns options tend to fix most of these network issues.
